DOC.brief_summary: Post market clinical follow-up study Sinus-venous stent . Patients venous iliofemoral occlusive disease treat Sinus-venous stent . This observational study provide 1 year data safety efficacy .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Sinus-Venous Stent Treatment Iliofemoral Venous Occlusive Disease
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age study entry least 18 year . 2 . Patient must sign informed consent form prior indexprocedure . 3 . Patient suffers acute chronic venous occlusive disease indicate treated venous stent . 4 . Target lesion locate femoral vein , common femoral vein , external iliac vein , common iliac vein . 1 . Intolerance anticoagulant medication . 2 . Contraindication prolong anticoagulant treatment . 3 . Life expectancy less 1 year . 4 . Target vessel stented . 5 . Coagulopathy know uncorrectable bleeding diathesis . 6 . Recent ( < 1 year ) pulmonary embolism . 7 . Pregnancy . 8 . Known hypersensitivity nitinol and/or nickel . 9 . Known , suspect unable comply study protocol ( e.g . permanent address , know noncompliant present unstable psychiatric history ) . 10 . Legal incapacity and/or circumstance render patient unable understand nature , scope possible impact study . 11 . Patients custody juridical order . 12 . Patients agree transmission cod data within liability documentation notification . 13 . Close affiliation investigational site : e.g . close relative investigator possibly dependent person ( e.g . employee student investigational site ) .
